title: Unique Two Story Loft With City Views - 22 Foot Tall Windows!
posting_body: Welcome to The Modern
Welcome to The Modern where first impressions are everything.
From the gracious greeting, you will receive upon arrival to the natural materials and finishes that act as an extension of the surrounding beauty, every detail has been carefully curated.
Beginning on the 13th floor, every one of our residences has a breathtaking panoramic view of Elliott Bay or the Seattle skyline with striking floor-to-ceiling windows.
The Conservatory is the heart of the building.

An exclusive club hall for a vertical neighborhood made up of six unique spaces that enliven two floors of the building: The Foyer, The Bar, The Video Wall, The Club Room, The Loft, and multiple private dining / executive board rooms.
The immediate area is rich with dozens of cultural attractions, restaurants, and nightlife options within walking distance, placing The Modern at the front steps of recreation.
Amenities Include:
Laundry and dry-cleaning services
Car washing and in-house luxury car share
Restaurant reservations and recommendations
Paddleboard and bike rentals
24-hour front desk coverage
After-hours snack menu
Package service and in-home delivery
Children’s Studio with day care available
In-home personal bartender
View dome butler service
Call:
